title: National Hockey League - Chicago Blackhawks home attendance 2005 to 2019
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting Total attendance, and Average attendance. The y axis indicates the Home attendance and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Total attendance is gradually increasing, Average attendance is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Home attendance in descending order is: 1. Total attendance, and lastly, 2. Average attendance.
Overall across the Year, Total attendance mostly maintained the highest Home attendance when compared to others with a mean value of 804064.07, and it peaked at 2018/19.
The botommost line, Average attendance,  has a mean of 20255.86, and peaked at 2018/19.

The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Total attendance, and lastly, 2. Average attendance.
